channel.title: MarketWatch.com - Top Stories
channel.description: MarketWatch, a leading publisher of business and financial news, offers users up-to-the minute news, investment tools, and subscription products.
channel.copyright: Copyright © Dow Jones & Company, Inc. All rights reserved.

item.title: Mortgage rates are falling. Here’s how much a typical homeowner can save if they refinance.
item.description: How much can the average homeowner saving by refinancing? It depends on where they are starting from.
item.dc:creator: Aarthi Swaminathan

item.title: Why Broadcom’s earnings are clicking with investors after Nvidia’s fell flat
item.description: Broadcom is smaller than Nvidia, setting up a compelling growth trajectory. And the company teased new customer wins.
item.dc:creator: Emily Bary

item.title: Crude prices gain on reports of U.S. plan to refill its oil reserve
item.description: Oil futures rose Friday, buoyed by reported U.S. plans to refill the nation’s Strategic Petroleum Reserve to full capacity, which would lead to tighter global supplies.
item.dc:creator: Myra P. Saefong
William Watts

item.title: ‘Don’t get your operation on a Thursday,’ this hospital expert warned. Here’s his plan to lower costs and save lives.
item.description: Eugene Litvak has a proven way to improve U.S. hospitals. If only they’d let him.
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Burton

item.title: Home buyers are fed up with high mortgage rates, Fannie Mae says
item.description: The vast majority of people in the U.S. believe it is a bad time to buy a home.
item.dc:creator: Aarthi Swaminathan

item.title: Bond yields drift lower after February jobs data miss expectations
item.description: U.S. government debt continued to rally Friday morning, pushing yields broadly lower, ahead of a speech by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and after February’s nonfarm-payrolls report produced fewer job gains than expected.
item.dc:creator: Vivien Lou Chen
Steve Goldstein

item.title: Here’s what recent history says happens after the S&P 500 breaches this critical level
item.description: The current market volatility offers opportunity, says NewEdge Wealth
item.dc:creator: Jamie Chisholm

item.title: Nasdaq wants to launch 24-hour trading Monday through Friday. Here are the challenges it faces.
item.description: Nasdaq Inc. on Friday announced the most ambitious plan yet by a major U.S. exchange operator to allow stocks to be traded around the clock.
item.dc:creator: Joseph Adinolfi
Gordon Gottsegen

item.title: Intuitive Machines’ stock plunge after moon landing is an ‘overreaction’: analyst
item.description: Intuitive Machines’ Athena moon landing may have suffered the same fate as its Odysseus lander last year and toppled over on the lunar surface.
item.dc:creator: James Rogers

item.title: Wayfair’s technology investments are allowing it to cut hundreds of tech jobs
item.description: Stock bounces off a two-year low as Wayfair says it expects to see savings from its job cuts in the second half of 2025.
item.dc:creator: Tomi Kilgore
